attributes.action: Suspend Tax and Vat for all active workers.
attributes.additional_details: Government should to let all active workers which working hard all days and nights to help resolve problem in food transport, NHS  staff etc. As they cant stay at home. Its will be a great appreciate for all of them.
attributes.background:
Suspend tax and vat for all active workers
As some people still need to work instead of stay home to keep running most important business at this stage. I would like to ask government to suspend tax and vat for all active worker at this moment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
